activity: EL EXTRANJERO (foreigner/abroad) - Masculine noun. Practice meanings.
prompt: Quiz me on the Spanish noun EXTRANJERO. Masculine. As noun: el extranjero (foreigner). As phrase: en el extranjero (abroad). Test me with sentences using different meanings. Use Castilian Spanish.

activity: EL/LA TURISTA (tourist) - Same form, different article.
prompt: Quiz me on the Spanish noun TURISTA (tourist). Same form for both: el turista (male), la turista (female). Test me with article agreement and fill-in sentences. Use Castilian Spanish.

activity: LA HABITACIÓN (room) - Feminine noun. Practice usage.
